summary: This is an email chain from June 2021 between an Assistant United States Attorney and an FBI Special Agent discussing a follow-up conversation about images from CDs recovered from Jeffrey Epstein's New York house, including a spreadsheet from a vendor (PAE).

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.role: FBI Special Agent - New York Office Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force
persons.context: The FBI Special Agent is being contacted by an AUSA to discuss images from CDs recovered from Epstein's NY house and confirms availability for a call.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.role: Assistant United States Attorney, Southern District of New York
persons.context: The AUSA requests a meeting with an FBI Special Agent to discuss images from CDs recovered from Epstein's NY house and references a spreadsheet from vendor PAE.

connections.description: The AUSA is coordinating with the FBI Special Agent to review evidence (images from CDs) related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Scheduled discussion about Epstein evidence
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney and an FBI Special Agent plan to discuss images recovered from CDs at Epstein's New York house.

locations: St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The email discusses a planned conversation between an AUSA and an FBI Special Agent about images from CDs recovered from Jeffrey Epstein's New York house.
A vendor named PAE provided a spreadsheet related to the images, which the AUSA wants to discuss with the FBI agent.
The correspondence indicates ongoing investigative work in the Epstein case as of June 2021, focusing on digital evidence recovery.
